CustomField.description: This value is used to set the field Log__c.LogRetentionDate__c, which is then used by LogBatchPurger to delete old logs. To keep logs indefinitely, set this field to blank (null).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This value is used to set the field Log__c.LogRetentionDate__c, which is then used by LogBatchPurger to delete old logs. To keep logs indefinitely, set this field to blank (null).
CustomField.label: Days to Retain Logs
